description:
Convert a 3-file matrix4 to a workbench sparse file.

Converts the matrix 4 output of probtrackx to workbench sparse file format.  Exactly one of -surface-seeds and -volume-seeds must be specified.

orientation_file.title: orientation_file
orientation_file.description: the .fiberTEMP.nii file this trajectory file applies to

voxel_list.title: voxel_list
voxel_list.description: list of white matter voxel index triplets as used in the trajectory matrix

wb_sparse_out.title: wb_sparse_out
wb_sparse_out.description: output - the output workbench sparse file

opt_surface_seeds_seed_roi.title: opt_surface_seeds_seed_roi
opt_surface_seeds_seed_roi.description: specify the surface seed space: metric roi file of all vertices used in the seed space

cifti_template.title: cifti_template
cifti_template.description: cifti file to use the volume mappings from

direction.title: direction
direction.description: dimension along the cifti file to take the mapping from, ROW or COLUMN
